text:
Metro Sport Reporter for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 10:10 pm Antoine Greizmann has been heavily linked with Manchester United (Picture: Getty) 
Antoine Griezmann‚Äôs brohter, Theo, attended Manchester United‚Äôs win against Saint Etienne in the Europa League. 
The Frenchman has caused a stir among United supporters in recent months with a number of suggestive tweets over the future of his brother. 
The Red Devils have been heavily linked with a ¬£85million move for the Atletico Madrid striker, although he admitted earlier this month that he was having doubts over a move to the Premier League. 
Theo, though, is known to be a Manchester United supporter and he teased United supporters with a number of updates on Twitter during the side‚Äôs 1-0 win in France.
